//   halfTexelOffset c68      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c0, 255, -128, 0.00787401572, 3276.75
    def c1, 0.5, 1, 255, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_normal v1
    dcl_texcoord v2
    dcl_texcoord1 v3
    dcl_texcoord2 v4
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord1 o2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord2 o3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord3 o4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord4 o5.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 o6

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mul r0.xyz, c65, v0.y
    mad r0.xyz, c64, v0.x, r0
    mad r0.xyz, c66, v0.z, r0
    add o5.xyz, r0, c67
    mad r0.xyz, v3, c0.x, c0.y
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c0.z
    mul r1.xyz, r0.y, c65
    mad r0.xyw, c64.xyzz, r0.x, r1.xyzz
    mad r0.xyz, c66, r0.z, r0.xyww
    nrm r1.xyz, r0
    mad r0.xyz, v4, c0.w, c0.w
    mul o3.xyz, r0.x, r1
    mad r2.xyz, v1, c0.x, c0.y
    mul r2.xyz, r2, c0.z
    mul r3.xyz, r2.y, c65
    mad r2.xyw, c64.xyzz, r2.x, r3.xyzz
    mad r2.xyz, c66, r2.z, r2.xyww
    nrm r3.xyz, r2
    mul r2.xyz, r1.yzxw, r3.zxyw
    mad r1.xyz, r3.yzxw, r1.zxyw, -r2
    mul o2.xyz, r0.z, r3
    nrm r2.xyz, r1
    mul o4.xyz, r0.y, r2
    mul r0, c9, v0.y
    mad r0, c8, v0.x, r0
    mad r0, c10, v0.z, r0
    add r0, r0, c11
    add r1.x, r0.w, r0.x
    add r1.y, r0.w, -r0.y
    mad r1.xy, r0.w, c68, r1
    mul r5.xy, r1, c1.x
    mov o0, r0
    mov r5.zw, r0
    mul o1, c1.yyyz, v2

// approximately 40 instruction slots used


// Output adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --adjust=texcoord5 --adjust-multiply=0.5 --git VertexShader_109_CRC32_9C6EFC5F.txt
texldl r4, c220.z, s0
add r4.w, r5.w, -r4.y
mul r4.w, r4.w, r4.x
mul r4.w, r4.w, c220.w
add r5.x, r5.x, r4.w
mov o6, r5
